You would think this game being as large as it is would have cross progression and since I lost everything and have barely any friends who play with me anymore I don't want to play it. As the reviews for this game SHOULD and do say is it is toxic. This game has seriously one of the most toxic and hate full communities I've ever had the displeasure of playing and interacting with. If you have never played this game and are considering buying it, keep your money, your better off buying food.

A buggy mess that constantly gets ignored patch after patch, not addressing so many gamebreaking issues (blight bugs, nurse bugs, etc.)
超级棒的非对称游戏，被追杀的感觉很刺激，16年直播偶然看到的游戏，那时候的地图氛围暗的吓人，自己也很菜不会玩乱跑，经常逛街，单排队友脑溢血，组排互相下饭操作，玩人血压过山车，玩屠夫全靠心理博弈，你永远都不知道对面的操作有多么白给，心情不好玩几把马上释放你的小心脏，球球杀机多出点好看的衣服吧，孩子都急哭了。

Hola hoy voy a dar los puntos buenos como los malos del DBD
positivos:
partidas duran entre 15 y 20 minutos haciendo que se pueda jugar partidas rapidas y dinamicas y no duran 1 hora como LOL:
Buen juego con mucho contenido y tenes muchas cosas para elijir:
no es un juego muy tenebroso pero algun susto te puede dar:
Suelen hacer muchas actualizaciones seguidas
es un juego que anda en una pc decente
Negativas:
Comunidad toxica  como campeo:slugeo:tuneleo:face campeo que te sacan un poco las ganas de jugar y tambien hay otras como rusheo:linternita:T-bag y obviamente  insultos igual hay ecepiones con algunas personas:
Servidores hechos bolsas:soles tener entre 200ms a 100ms y aun que tengas buen internet seguis teniendo lag
Hits falsos suele pasar que el killer te tire un hit/golpe y aun que el no  te dio te hace daño suele pasar por que las hit boxs son capsulas   mas grande que los pixeles y tambien por el ping que suele ser malo
es un poco pay to win: ya que los mejores killers suelen que solo se puedan conseguir si los compras que solo son los de licencia o  mejor  conocido con los de peliculas series juegos etc etc.
y la ultima cosa mala es que la mayoria del contenido es de paga cuando el juego es de paga si no le das tanto vicio puede ser un juego muy disfrutable
Esta bueno, estaría bien un modo con 2 killers para jugarlo en duo
玩可以玩，但是这游戏的匹配机制太差，我11段杀手匹配到4段逃生，我是不知道怎么玩了，人类的胜率太大了，人类车队可以把屠夫玩的云里雾里，建议不买DLC，用暗金细胞买划算

Literally one of the most rage inducing games, every 10 matches will be fun but most matches is purely torture and not worth anyone's time. The developers just nerf and remove everything the killers complain about and don't even stop to consider how it affects survivors play and enjoyment. So no, I wouldn't recommend this to anyone unless you are a killer main or if you are just dying to want to feel nothing but rounds of endless aggravation.

Honestly its a super fun game. Whether you are playing killer or survivor I feel like it has the potential to be an absolute boat load of fun. I have 65 hours in the 2-3 weeks that I've owned the game. Needless to say this is one of my favorite games now. Not to mention being able to play as Michael Myers or even The Nemesis from Resident Evil!

Эта игра подарила мне боязнь звона колокольчика,замечательные моменты беготни от K-попера и получения топором в лицо, а так же возможность побегать от Майкла Майерса под звуки пианино и поиграть в гляделки с Криком

stupid hitbox zgsb  after 4 years in development common bug are still not fix, plus mori and keys are broken as well with one shot add-on. this game is garbage. does not allow me to escape through hatch while im down, asking me to recover instead. stupid and rubbish hitbox forever useless. connection to the server also cmi, always disconnect to the host or join the game without friends. cant even drop pallet properly. pallet stunt and killer's axe still hit me.

useless killers only know how to camp and tunnel. survivors cannot even help teammates. useless game
